text: The Prodigal is a 1955 American drama movie directed by Richard Thorpe and starring Lana Turner, Edmund Purdom, Louis Calhern, Audrey Dalton, Neville Brand, Walter Hampden, Cecil Kellaway, Joseph Wiseman. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Thorpe
title: The Prodigal
